bug.author: lucafei
bug.summary: vibration of multirotor happend at flying
bug.description:
hello, guys, i met a problem at flying multirotor. When i set a goal position to multirotor and run the airsim to fly. The multirotor will begin to vibrate at flying. This cause finally in programm stopping. I recorded this case and you can clearly see the problem in following <denchmark-link:https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/29920326/95316841-9dc44600-0894-11eb-8b3e-8e80351e0a03.gif></denchmark-link>
does anyone have some ideas for this, how to fix this or it is a issues in airsim?

comments.comment: Thank you <denchmark-link:https://github.com/lucafei>@lucafei</denchmark-link> for the record. dup of <denchmark-link:https://github.com/microsoft/AirSim/issues/1394>#1394</denchmark-link> ?
